inclusion.criterion: Provide written informed consent and the willingness and ability to comply with all aspects of study requirements
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Inpatients ≥ 18 years of age with an indwelling catheter in place for at least 5 days with a plan for removal
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients planned for discharge with an indwelling catheter in place
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Clinical signs or symptoms of urinary tract infection at the time of consent
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of recurrent UTIs, but is currently in remission. They have an indwelling catheter and are being treated with antibiotics.
